thread.title: Blanca Blanco

author: Blanca Blanco
title: Blanca Blanco
text: What a refreshing experience! My international order had some bumps along the way but Edeloptics' superb customer service made the process painless by providing prompt email notifications with easy remediation steps to follow. Once the order processed through, Edeloptics secured delivery of the merchandise without further delay. Got my frames much earlier than expected. Vielen Dank, Edeloptics!
